attributes.action: Increase The Age of Consent From 16 to 18
attributes.additional_details: The United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) defines a child as everyone under the age of 18, so why should we give a child consent to something so sensitive? Furthermore, the human brain attains peak processing power & memory around age 18 meaning those under that age are still developing so to give them the power of consent is almost preposterous. Sounds illogical right? Why exploit a child to sexual activities at such a young age? Join me to getting this changed!
attributes.background: The legal age of consent (16) in the United Kingdom has always been baffling & raises controversy given the vulnerability a 16 year old holds at a young age. This gives those well above this age, the opportunity to prey on those vulnerable, using this as a loophole, opening the doors to pedophilia.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Raise the age of consent for sex from 16 to 18:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644226
